g++  -isysroot /Applications/Xcode.app/Contents/Developer/Platforms/MacOSX.platform/Developer/SDKs/MacOSX12.1.sdk -mmacosx-version-min=11.6 -Wl,-search_paths_first -Wl,-headerpad_max_install_names -Wall -Werror -Wextra -Wpedantic -fsanitize=address -fsanitize=leak -fsanitize=undefined -g --coverage CMakeFiles/tests.dir/tests/test_functions.cpp.o -o tests  s21_matrix_oop.a /usr/local/lib/libgtest_main.a /usr/local/lib/libgtest.a
